title: The surprising thing DiCaprio did during The Revenant
text:
The surprising thing DiCaprio did during "The Revenant" 
CBS News Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Leonardo DiCaprio is calling "The Revenant" shoot one of the most difficult in his life, and by difficult, he means sleep-inside-an-animal-carcass difficult.In an interview with...
